item.description:
The movie this weekend is Superman Returns. The showtime is 2:30pm. If your interested email me back rsdragon@optonline.net . Maybe we can get lunch before hand or if not, we need to meet up at 1:30pm with your ticket under the sign that says "Theatres 3-19" because it is the first weekend playing and everyone wants to see the movie. That's why you have to be there in an hour in advance.

Definitely get back to me if you want to eat something before hand

Ross
item.name: MEDFORD/BOSTON MOVIE GOERS FAN MEETUP GROUP Meetup
